articles.title: States submit Hyperloop proposals
articles.content:
By Jeff Ayars
Producer, Morning Joe
Virgin Hyperloop One (VHO), the high-speed transportation company founded in 2014, has announced its next phase of development: a nationwide search and evaluation for the first official hyperloop certification site.  This… [+2896 chars]

articles.title: Fmr. Sen. Barbara Boxer on impeachment managers: ‘They are not partisan flame throwers. They are very serious capable people.’
articles.description: Former Senator Barbara Boxer joins MSNBC’s Craig Melvin to reflect on the Clinton impeachment trial and weigh in on the announcement of impeachment managers.

articles.title: Wednesday's Campaign Round-Up, 1.15.20
articles.description: Today's installment of campaign-related news items from across the country.
articles.content:
Today’s installment of campaign-related news items from across the country.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Did Rudy change or did America?
articles.description: How did Rudy Giuliani go from America's mayor the man he is today? Jonathan Mahler digs for answers in his latest piece for the New York Times magazine, and he joins Morning Joe to discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Kasie Hunt: Weight and history in announcement of impeachment managers
articles.description: MSNBC's Kasie Hunt shares the mood on Capitol Hill as the impeachment managers were announced, and how the choice of managers went beyond the usual politics.

articles.title: Pelosi introduces 'managers' who'll try...
articles.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi has named seven members to serve as impeachment "managers" - and their relevant experiences are of interest.
articles.content:
Once it became clear that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) would end her delay of the impeachment proceedings, and send the articles to the Senate for a trial, there was one big question on the minds of observers: who’ll try the case?
This morning, Pelo… [+2601 chars]

articles.title: Pelosi chooses diverse, 'talented' team of litigators to prosecute Trump
articles.description: Ari Melber, David Jolly, Eugene Robinson and Claire McCaskill discuss the qualifications of the seven House members chosen by Speaker Nancy Pelosi to prosecute the case against President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Trump keeps taking aim at House impeachment process, to no avail
articles.description: We're left with a familiar question for which there is no good answer: why, exactly, are we supposed to think the House impeachment process was "unfair"?

articles.title: Nadler: Hunter Biden is 'not a relevant witness' for the Senate impeachment trial
articles.description: Rep. Jerry Nadler, D-N.J., said that Hunter Biden is "not a relevant witness" to the Senate impeachment trial against President Trump.

articles.title: Docs provide new details of Trump's pressure campaign on Ukraine

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: What Andrew Yang thinks his chances are
articles.description: Andrew Yang wasn't on the Democratic debate stage last night, but he will have a major impact on Iowa and beyond. He joins Stephanie Ruhle to react to what he saw last night and what he thinks his chances are 19 days from now at the caucuses.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: $1 trillion deficits return, despite Trump's campaign promises
articles.description: As U.S. budget deficits top $1 trillion again, these aren't exactly the fiscal results Donald Trump promised the electorate before his election.
articles.content: Donald Trump appeared on Rush Limbaugh’s program last week and boasted that the United States is taking in more revenue now than we did when we had the higher taxes because the economy’s doing so well. It’s a familiar thought in Republican circles: lower taxe… [+4278 chars]
